Plot: The adventures of a teenager who is fresh out and in Middle School, where he has to learn the consequences and responsibility to survive the year.
Title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
Writer: Jackie Filgo (screenplay), Jeff Filgo (screenplay), Gabe Sachs (screenplay), Jeff Judah (screenplay), Jeff Kinney (book)
Actors: Zachary Gordon, Robert Capron, Rachael Harris, Steve Zahn
tomatoConsensus: Unlike its bestselling source material, Diary of a Wimpy Kid fails to place a likable protagonist at the center of its middle-school humor -- and its underlying message is drowned out as a result.
